price: Yeroo xiqqoof isaan ni qanansiifna. Sana booda gara azaaba guddaatti isaan dirqisiifna.
arabic: نُمَتِّعُهُمۡ قَلِيلٗا ثُمَّ نَضۡطَرُّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.
